Package com.orientechnologies.orient.enterprise.channel.binary

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OChannelListener
    Listener of events against network channel
    ORemoteServerEventListener
    Listener Interface to get called when asynchronous events are received from the remote server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OChannelBinary
    Abstract representation of a channel.
    OChannelBinaryProtocol
    The range of the requests is 1-79.
    OChannelBinaryServer  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ODistributedRedirectException
    The operation will be redirect to another server.
    ONetworkProtocolException  
    OResponseProcessingException  
    OTokenSecurityException
